body_html: I know that it doesn't work on 3.7. I got it to install by changing from cmake 3.7 to cmake 3.6, but even though it installed, it does not run code properly on gpu for me. As shown by the above outputs, the code fails on gpu but works fine on cpu.

body: I know that it doesn't work on 3.7. I got it to install by changing from cmake 3.7 to cmake 3.6, but even though it installed, it does not run code properly on gpu for me. As shown by the above outputs, the code fails on gpu but works fine on cpu.
